meanings.definition: Having the quality of softening or soothing the skin.
meanings.sent1: The emollient lotion made her skin feel smooth and soft.
meanings.sent2: She applied the emollient cream to her dry hands.
meanings.sent3: The emollient balm worked like magic on her chapped lips.
meanings.sent4: His words were an emollient touch on her troubled heart.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of the emollient fabric was comforting.

meanings.definition: A substance that softens or soothes the skin.
meanings.sent1: She bought an emollient to help with her sunburn.
meanings.sent2: The emollient was recommended by the dermatologist.
meanings.sent3: The emollient felt like a soothing hug for her skin.
meanings.sent4: The emollient acted as a guardian for her delicate skin.
meanings.sent5: Applying the emollient was like giving her skin a gentle kiss.
